channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flashing bollard, 17th December
item.description:
Keep left bollard is flashing constantly and has been for months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Elmbridge Court Roundabout, 17th December
item.description:
There are a number of street lights not working here. Would be grateful if someone could take a look and get them working again please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elm Bridge Court, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ice rink footpath, 16th December
item.description:
The footpath near the underpass and the pub is dangerously icy. I am a fit able-bodied person and I am now nursing a bruised hand after slipping over for the second time having only walked through that area twice since the snow fell. Not gritting the paths may be saving money for the council but it will be putting extra pressure on the NHS.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Limber Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fairly deep pothole, 15th December
item.description:
Large deep pothole on the left of the road as you face the school from Cornwall Avenue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 32 Cornwall Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 15th December
item.description:
Opposite The Clock Tower
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 299 Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking restriction signs have been defaced, 15th December
item.description:
Several of the signs in Marle Hill Parade showing the parking restrictions have been defaced with black paint, obscuring the information. As well as Marle Hill Parade, the sign outside 25 Marle Hill Road has been defaced and the one outside 3 Dunalley Parade.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 27 Marle Hill Parade, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thick ice on road. Very dangerous, 14th December
item.description:
The true Ning from Shakespeare Road to Kipling road ans vice versa is treacherous. The ice is so thick and there is going to be a serious accident soon. I need my car to take my disabled daughter to school but it’s terrifying driving on the roads around st marks. Can they be gritted ASAP please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 43 Kipling Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Icy cycle lane, 14th December
item.description:
Could not use the new cycle lanes along A40 as they have not been gritted or cleared of snow. Please grit them when you grit the roads.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Kingsley Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road like an ice rink,, 14th December
item.description:
Road urgently needs gritting. Accidents requiring police attendance and diversion of buses/cancellation of school bus 4 days after causatory snow is not acceptable
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Norwood North Road East, The Reddings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burst pipe, 14th December
item.description:
Burst pipe. Water leaking
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 159 Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New cycle route along busy A40 is not gritted and unsafe for cyclists and pedestrians, 14th December
item.description:
Pavement and cycle path needs to be gritted to avoid having to use the main road. The edge near the kerb is unsafe to cycle on causing great risk with busy traffic often going at high speeds, as the road is clear.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 394 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road is like an IceRink - it hasn’t been gritted and is dangerouslol, 14th December
item.description:
I live in Nettleton Road and trying to get in or out of Benhall is awful, loads of accidents - no gritting !!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36 Nettleton Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken plastic sledge abandoned in Park, 14th December
item.description:
This broken plastic sledge was left in Benhall Park. It has been moved to the marked location (beside the refuse bin at the foot of the sloped path) by a resident. Please arrange collection soon so it does not get thrown into the stream. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10 cm deep pothole on Tennyson Road approach to roundabout, 14th December
item.description:
10 cm deep pothole on Tennyson Road approach to roundabout, deep enough to throw a cyclist off

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 65 Tennyson Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole left from cable works, 14th December
item.description:
Works to install fibre optics seem to have been mostly completed on the road but this gaping hole has been left. I've moved the barriers so they are covering it (they weren't previously). This needs sorting ASAP and not left as is.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 108 Hester's Way Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous Street lights not working, 13th December
item.description:
Virtually all the Street lights between Caernarvon Road and Warden Hill Road in Cheltenham are not working (Street light 1 to 21) Morrison's side of the road and have been out of commission for well over a month if not longer.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Caernarvon Road, Up Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian route not gritted, 13th December
item.description:
As well as being a pedestrian footpath, the east side of Princess Elizabeth Way is also used by cyclists. It is presently like an ice rink. Please apply road grit to it as soon as possible. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 599 Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle route not gritted, 13th December
item.description:
Most of the main cycleway along the A40 is a sheet of compacted ice, completely deadly to cyclists, whilst the carway has been gritted. These are dangerous conditions in which to be forcing cyclists to mix with cars. Please grit/salt the cycle routes as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Kingsley Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing Grit bin, 13th December
item.description:
The grit bin has been removed and not relaxed from this very dangerous junction. Please could it be replaced and filled. The Abbotswood Road-Castle Hill Road Junction is especially treacherous with cars loosing control Upton entering Castle Hill Drive and hitting the curb. Please could the grit bin be replaced at your earliest convenience.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Castle Hill Drive, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grit bin needs refilling., 13th December
item.description:
Grit bin is low, and what is there has gone lumpy and difficult to use.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Well Cottage The Burgage, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet
